mutants.code:
def reverse_string(string):
    length = len(string)
    if length < 1:
        return string
    string = list(string)
    for i in range(length // 2):
        string[i] = chr(ord(string[i]) ^ ord(string[length - i - 1]))
        string[length - i - 1] = chr(ord(string[i]) ^ ord(string[length - i - 1]))
        string[i] = chr(ord(string[i]) ^ ord(string[length - i - 1]))
    string = ''.join(string)
    return string
